pageTitle: Hanky Panky Peek-a-Boo Lana Bra | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit * Bottoms sold separately. * Made in the USA. * Hand wash. * Mesh: 89% nylon/11% spandex. * Lace: 95% nylon/5% spandex. This double-layered colorblock mesh bralette features a lace overlay, lace trim, and ribbon bow accents at the cups. Picot trim at wings and at adjustable straps. Hook-and-eye closure. Semi-sheer. Description Hanky Panky > video play Need Assistance? Contact Us Now
textAfterTable: Bra Fitting With a bra on, wrap a tape measure snugly, but not too tightly, around your rib cage, just below your bust line. This is your band size (US/UK sizing uses inches). Then, wrap the tape measure around the fullest part of your bust. If the difference is: 1" / 2.5cm your cup size is A 2" / 5cm your cup size is B 3" / 7.5cm your cup size is C 4" / 10cm your cup size is D Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Made in the USA since 1977, Hanky Panky began as a set of handmade lingerie crafted from embroidered handkerchiefs and became a trend-setting label with the introduction of the Original Rise Thong in the 1980s. New York-based friends and co-founders Gale Epstein and Lida Orzeck continue to influence the industry today with their unique blend of traditional and glam and the high-quality, comfortable materials that make Hanky Panky the go-to garments for women around the world.
